Text: Actually this was part of a bigger folder, and it's not so big, so there are almost no interventions on the bag patterns: the only thing that I edited quite a bit is the book by Emma King "25 bags to knit". I tried to make the page backgrounds white instead of "scanner blueish grey" or "scanner pinkish grey" and lighten up the pictures as well, giving some contrast etc... It took me quite a lot, because you cannot do batch work of this kind. You can see a couple of pages I left as they were, for comparison.
brilliant collection of knitting patterns.  A bag to suit everyone
